meanings.definition: To utter a sound expressing hesitation or doubt.
meanings.sent1: She hawed before answering the difficult question.
meanings.sent2: He always hawed before making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The puppy hawed softly before approaching the unfamiliar object.
meanings.sent4: The old clock hawed its final chime before stopping forever.
meanings.sent5: The singer hawed nervously before hitting the high note.

meanings.definition: To turn to one side in a hesitant or evasive manner.
meanings.sent1: The cat hawed away from the water, not wanting to get wet.
meanings.sent2: She hawed to avoid the direct gaze of the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hawed around the obstacle in its path.
meanings.sent4: The car hawed to the right to avoid the pothole.
meanings.sent5: He hawed to the left to dodge the incoming ball.
